Subsection.Text: A lease, although subject to this chapter, is also subject to any applicable:

Paragraph.Text: Certificate-of-title statute of this state: chapter 319 or chapter 328;
Certificate-of-title statute of another jurisdiction (s. 680.1051); or
Consumer protection statute of this state or final consumer protection decision of a court of this state existing on the effective date of this chapter.

Subsection.Text: In case of conflict between this chapter, other than ss. 680.1051, 680.304(3), and 680.305(3), and a statute or decision referred to in subsection (1), the statute or decision controls.
Failure to comply with an applicable law has only the effect specified therein.
